sentences.en: Are you so tired you don’t have the energy to engage with your kids?
sentences.cn: 你难道累得都没有精力陪你的孩子们了吗？

sentences.en: Can you engage that all his statements are trustworthy?
sentences.cn: 你能担保他的话都可靠 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had been able to engage some staff.
sentences.cn: 他已经能够雇用一些员工。

sentences.en: Her father engaged a tutor to improve her maths.
sentences.cn: 她爸爸请了一位家庭教师给她补习数学。

sentences.en: I can engage for his honesty.
sentences.cn: 我保证他为人诚实.

sentences.en: I have never engaged in drug trafficking.
sentences.cn: 我从来没有从事过贩毒。

sentences.en: I'll engage for John's behaviour should you decide to employ him.
sentences.cn: 如果你决定聘用约翰,我愿为他的行为担保.

sentences.en: It could engage the enemy beyond the range of hostile torpedoes.
sentences.cn: 从这可以避开敌方鱼雷区对敌人发动进攻。

sentences.en: It is difficult to engage teachers of quality.
sentences.cn: 很难招聘到优秀教师.

sentences.en: Our orders are to engage at once.
sentences.cn: 我们的命令是立刻进攻.

sentences.en: Press the lever until you hear the catch engage.
sentences.cn: 压下挡杆，直到听到挡挂好。

sentences.en: She engaged the clutch and the car moved.
sentences.cn: 她踩下离合器，汽车便开动了。

sentences.en: She found it hard to engage with office life.
sentences.cn: 她发现很难适应办公室生活。

sentences.en: She had vowed to go out of her way to engage with the Irish people at local community level.
sentences.cn: 她已经发誓要努力和当地的爱尔兰人建立关系。

sentences.en: The wheel engages with the cog and turns it.
sentences.cn: 轮子咬住轮齿并带动它转动。

sentences.en: They never learned skills to engage the attention of the others.
sentences.cn: 他们从未学过吸引他人注意的技巧。

sentences.en: We engage him as technical adviser.
sentences.cn: 我们聘请他担任技术顾问.

sentences.en: We engage you as a legal adviser.
sentences.cn: 我们聘请你当法律顾问.

sentences.en: We never engage in irregularities.
sentences.cn: 我们决不搞歪的邪的.

sentences.en: You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
sentences.cn: 你可以参加南边草坪上的槌球游戏。

words.tran_cn: 保证；约定；同…订婚（engage的过去分词）
从事；答应，保证；交战；啮合

trans.tran_cn: （使）参与，吸引，雇用，适应，与…交战，引起（注意、兴趣）
trans.tran_en: to be doing or to become involved in an activity
to be doing or to become involved in an activity

trans.tran_cn: 吸引；占用；使从事，使忙于；雇用，聘；使订婚
trans.tran_en: to attract someone’s attention and keep them interested
